text: The Chevrolet Silverado EV is a electric pickup by Chevrolet. == Overview == The Silverado EV was introduced at 2022 Consumer Electrics Show (CES) on January 5, 2022. The production started at the Factory Zero plant in May 2023. title: Chevrolet Silverado EV
